Comments_List: I gained an insight into the key debates, issues, and methods of reasoning that has motivated various European philosophers in what is now more broadly called political theology. The class helped me frame a number of disparate, but important, texts into a helpful narrative so as to provide me a way to read these texts and similar ones in the future.
I would definitely recommend this class to other students who are interested in this topic.
